entry.title: FREEZING RAIN WARNING , Saint-Jean-sur-Richelieu
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 11:47 PM EST Thursday 16 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -1.8°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: L'Acadie 01:00 AM EST Friday 17 February 2023
Temperature: -1.8°C
Humidity: 79 %
Wind Chill: -7
Dewpoint: -4.8°C
Wind: NE 17 km/h gust 31 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Thursday night: Snow. Low minus 5.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Snow beginning this evening except freezing rain across upper Richelieu. Amount 5 to 10 cm. Wind becoming north 30 km/h gusting to 50 late this evening. Low minus 5. Wind chill minus 14 overnight. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Thursday 16 February 2023

entry.title: Friday: Snow. Temperature steady near minus 6.
entry.summary: Snow ending late in the afternoon then cloudy. Freezing rain across upper Richelieu in the morning. Amount 5 to 10 cm. Wind north 40 km/h gusting to 60 diminishing to 20 near noon then becoming light in the afternoon. Temperature steady near minus 6. Wind chill minus 15 in the morning and minus 10 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Thursday 16 February 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Clearing. Low minus 16.
entry.summary: Clearing late in the evening. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 16. Wind chill minus 10 in the evening and minus 19 overnight. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Thursday 16 February 2023
